description:
Learn QuickBooks Online! In this course, business owners and bookkeepers will learn the correct way to manage bank accounts in QuickBooks Online.

The course comes with a 20-page downloadable handout describing all the steps shown in the videos.

We'll demonstrate how to make bank transfers, easily pay credit card bills, and create General Journal Entries.

Then we'll go into depth on QBO's Bank Feed, showing you how to pull transactions into QuickBooks Online so that you don't have to enter everything manually. We'll also point out all the interface quirks, and show you how to troubleshoot as well.

Last, we'll go into detail on doing monthly bank Reconciliations, and I'll show you all my tips and tricks so that it takes minutes instead of hours.

As a QuickBooks ProAdvisor and member of the Intuit Trainer/Writer Network, I’ve assisted hundreds of small businesses to set up and troubleshoot their QuickBooks files, saving them time and money.

Complete this course and earn 1 CPE Credit!

This stand-alone course is one part of a series, including additional courses on setting up QBO, working with customers, managing expenses, and running reports.
title: QuickBooks Online: Banking
